item.title: [IRMENERGY] IRM Energy Ltd Announces Q3 & 9M FY2025 Financial Results with New Director Appointment
item.description:
IRM Energy Ltd has announced its unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025. The company's Board of Directors approved the results, which were prepared in accordance with the provisions of Regulation 33 of the SEBI Listing Regulations. The Board also approved the appointment of Mr. Vivek Vishwas Wathodkar as an Additional Independent Director and Independent Director for a period of 5 years, subject to member approval. The financial results showed a consolidated net loss of Rs. 8.07 million and Rs. 21.03 million for the quarter and year to date period, respectively.

  • Unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for Q3 and 9M FY2025 approved
  • New Additional Independent Director appointed (Mr. Vivek Vishwas Wathodkar)
  • Consolidated net loss of Rs. 8.07 million for the quarter and Rs. 21.03 million year to date
  • Appointment of Mr. Wathodkar subject to member approval
  • Financial results prepared according to Regulation 33 of SEBI Listing Regulations

item.title: [IRMENERGY] IRM Energy Ltd Updates Key Managerial Personnel Details
item.description:

item.title: [SAVINFOCO] Magnus Steel and Infra Corrigendum: Change in Post-Issue Shareholding of Proposed Allottee Ms. Arti Anjaria
item.description:
Magnus Steel and Infra Ltd has issued a corrigendum to the Notice of the Extra Ordinary General Meeting (EGM) dated January 15, 2026. The corrigendum is to inform the Shareholders of a change in the Explanatory Statement regarding the percentage of post-issue shareholding of the proposed allottee Ms. Arti Anjaria. The proposed allotment of equity shares to Ms. Arti Anjaria will now result in a 10.33% post preferential allotment shareholding instead of the previously stated 11.11%. This change is due to an inadvertent error in the original Explanatory Statement. The corrigendum forms an integral part of the Notice of EGM and is also available on the Company's website and BSE Limited website.

item.title: [IRMENERGY] IRM Energy Ltd Announces Q3 and 9M FY2025 Financial Results, Appoints New Independent Director
item.description:
IRM Energy Ltd has announced its unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025. The company's total comprehensive loss for the quarter and year to date period ended on December 31, 2025 is Rs. 8.07 million and Rs. 21.03 million respectively. The Board has also approved the appointment of Mr. Vivek Vishwas Wathodkar as an Additional Independent Director and Independent Director for a period of 5 years, subject to the approval of members of the Company. The financial results are in accordance with the provisions of Regulation 33 of the SEBI Listing Regulations, along with the Limited Review Report issued by Statutory Auditors.

  • The Board approved the appointment of Mr. Vivek Vishwas Wathodkar as an Additional Independent Director and Independent Director for a period of 5 years.
  • The appointment is subject to the approval of members of the Company.
